1.0.name: wordpress/azure-basic
1.0.description: A lightweight, two-column layout blog theme, with 6 widget areas and customizable header image. Valid HTML5 and CSS3 that can be modified. Compatiable with Wordpress 3.2 and above. Compatable IE7+, Opera 10+, Safari 5+, Firefox 3.5+.
